section.p: The sides of the pit are funnelled to prevent you climbing out. After a while the brigands arrive, dropping a net to ensnare you. They strip you of all your possessions and cash ( cross them off your Adventure Sheet). They are about to slit your throat when one of them thinks to ask if you have any money invested with the merchants’ guild. ‘Enough to pay a ransom of 150 Shards, say?’

If you can pay a ransom of 150 Shards, .
If not, the brigands kill you.
